name: Dread Gamble
description:
Help! You've fallen asleep and can't get up! Play a bunch of minigames to try to gain reality checks, but beware! If you lose your sanity from going round in circles too many times, you will die!

Controls: Mostly self-explanatory (click roll to roll, click a different die to roll that one next, and right-click + drag to move the camera around to see what the board brings - rolling will automatically re-center the camera on you). Spacebar or enter skips most infographics!
